content.value:
It's simple: for as long as tech turns a blind eye to white supremacists it is a comfortable place for them to exist and they will continue to thrive. 

It should be the opposite.

Do better. De-platform hate.
content.html: It's simple: for as long as tech turns a blind eye to white supremacists it is a comfortable place for them to exist and they will continue to thrive. It should be the opposite. Do better. De-platform hate.
